newsitem.title: USA: Material Technology, Securfone to merge.
newsitem.headline: Material Technology, Securfone to merge.

text.p: Material Technology Inc said on Wednesday it has signed a letter under which Securfone America will acquire no less than 90 percent of Material Technology's outstanding capital stock in a reverse merger.
Based in San Diego, Securfone America provides prepaid cellular and telephone line calling cards.
"This opportunity will benefit shareholders by giving them a stake in a new technology in the growing cellular business," Robert Bernstein, Materials Technology president, said in a statement.
Materials Technology is a development stage company engaged in researching and developing metal fatigue monitoring technologies.
